Package main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • main.Game
  • public class Game
extends javafx.application.Application
    Michael Mityushkin, Sean Vaserman Zomgman 3 - Gun Game Mr. Benum ICS 4UE Game class is the "main" class although there is a class called Main. It is the window in which everything is drawn and all events are handled
